rooms.description: A transitional space with large floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Spacious room with traditional Kerala wooden carvings and large windows ensuring ample daylight. Adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining proper orientation.
Open dining space adjacent to the living area with natural lighting and a view of the courtyard.
Modern Kerala-style kitchen with traditional elements. Located towards the back following Vastu norms for kitchens.
A comfortable guest room overlooking the courtyard and featuring floor-to-ceiling windows.
Dedicated space for servants with functional layout and natural light, located near kitchen.
Connecting corridor to the second level; designed with traditional Kerala woodwork details.
